attributes.action: Fund more sen schools and make them easier to access.
attributes.additional_details:
My son and thousands more children have no access to an sen school who need one. It is not a choice to be disabled and parents/carers should not need to fight for years for their child to attend one.
Extra needs children are being discriminated against. All children deserve the correct full time education regardless of ability. 
Local councils are placing extra needs children into mainstream and they are getting neglected just to save money.
attributes.background: Put more funding into opening special schools and make accessing them easier for special needs and disabled children easier.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

More Funding For SEN Children To Access Appropriate School Provisions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584129

Provide funding to increase school places for students with special needs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585658
